name: WhatsApp Restaurant
description: Add a WhatsApp button that connects diners directly to your restaurant. Perfect for restaurants, cafes, and food businesses looking to handle reservations, takeout orders, and customer inquiries through WhatsApp!

settings.content:
🍽️ Welcome to [Your Restaurant Name] 👨‍🍳

Thank you for choosing us! We're excited to serve you.

🌟 OUR SPECIALTIES:

🥘 Chef's Special: Fresh daily creations
🍖 House Favorites: Our most loved dishes
🥗 Healthy Options: Light & nutritious choices
🍷 Fine Wines: Curated wine selection

💫 WHY DINE WITH US?
✅ Fresh Ingredients - Farm to table quality
✅ Expert Chefs - Culinary masterminds
✅ Cozy Ambiance - Perfect for any occasion
✅ Outstanding Service - Your satisfaction guaranteed

📍 RESTAURANT INFO:
⏰ Hours: [Operating Hours]
📞 WhatsApp: [Your Number]
🌐 Website: [Your Website]
📍 Location: [Your Address]

🔥 SPECIAL OFFERS:
• Happy Hour: 50% off drinks (5-7pm)
• Weekend Brunch Special
• Family Package Deals

🎉 SERVICES:
• Dine-in Reservations
• Takeaway Orders
• Private Events
• Catering Services

📱 HOW TO ORDER:
1. Browse our menu: [Menu Link]
2. Send us your selection
3. Specify pickup/delivery time
4. We'll confirm your order!

Ready to order? Just send us a message! 😊
